XXbsu017_u:8: tasmai namaskṛtvā idamāryāvalokiteśvaramukhodgīrṇaṃ vajradharamahīyaṃ hayagrīvaṃ nāma paramahṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmisarvakarmārthasādhakam
XXbsu017_u:11: tadyathā om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarvaviṣaghātaka jvalitavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarāṭopapravṛddhavega vajrakhuranirghātaka calitavasudhātala niḥsvasitahasitamārutotkṣiptadharaṇīdhara parabhṛtagaṇasamūhavikṣobhaṇakara paravidyāsaṃbhakṣaṇakara sarvagrāhotsādanakara paramaśāntikarasarvagrahapraśamanakara budhya budhya dhāva dhāva ca bhagavā hayagrīva khāda khāda paramaṃtrām /
XXbsu017_u:12: rakṣa rakṣa kṣamasva kṣamasva sa mayābhihitāṃ mantrām /
XXbsu017_u:14: ghorapiśāca sarvagraheṣvapratihato mama varavajradaṃṣṭra kiṃ cirāpayasi /
XXbsu017_u:15: idaṃ duṣṭagrahaṃ duṣṭasattvaṃ duṣṭapiśācaṃ vā dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna kampa kampa matha matha pramatha pramatha /
XXbsu017_u:16: tathāgatājñāṃ pālaya buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ (Hgv 44) kuru kuru mā
XXbsu017_u:18: hayagrīvāya phaṭ vajrakhurāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrotkaṭabhayabhairavāya phaṭ
XXbsu017_u:26: yāvanto mamaye kecitahitaiṣiṇastān sarvān vaḍavāmukhena nikṛntaya phaṭ /
XXbsu017_u:28: sidhyantu mama maṃtrapadā hayagrīvo bhagavān ājñāpayati svāhā /
XXbsu017_u:29: ayaṃ hayagrīvavidyā rājā paṭhitasiddhaḥ upacāraḥ ātmarakṣājāpena pararakṣā paṃcaraṃgīsūtram ekaviṃśatigranthayaḥ kṛtvā bandhitavyam /
XXbsu017_u:32: sarvaparakṛtā maṃtrāśchinnā bhavanti sarvaśatravastambhanaṃ manasā vyavahāre svakham mukhe kṛtvā vidyā japtayā uttarāyati /
XXbsu017_u:33: spṛṣṭāveśaneṣusnātaṃ śucivastraprāvṛtaṃ śucau pradeśe sumanasāsaṃbaddhā āveśaye śuklavaliryathālaṃbhena
XXbsu017_u:34: candragrahe sūryagrahe ghṛtaṃ tāmrabhājane kṛtvā tāvajjepadyāvaccandro mukto bhavati taṃ ghṛtaṃ pive medhāvī bhavati ekenoddeśena ślokaśatamudgṛṇhāti /
XXbsu017_u:46: / bhasmanā sarṣapeṇa udakena sapta japtena rakṣā kartavyā /
